summary: The story of Aung San Suu Kyi as she becomes the core of Burma's democracy movement, and her relationship with her husband, writer Michael Aris.
cast: Markus Waldow|Michelle Yeoh|David Thewlis|Jonathan Raggett|Jonathan Woodhouse|Susan Wooldridge|Benedict Wong|Htun Lin|Agga Poechit|Donatienne Dupont|Phoe Zaw|Marian Yu|May|Ko Ko Win Aung|Thein Win|San Lwin|Zaw Oo|Nay Myo Thant|Victoria Sanvalli|Flint Bangkok|Thwel Zin Toe|Dujdao Vadhanapakorn|Sahajak Boonthanakit|Prapimporn Kanjunda|Soraya La-ong Ake|Star|Honey|William Hope|Jay Villiers|Louis Hilyer|Nicholas Jones|Anton Lesser|Paul Brennen|Amanda Lawrence|Fran√ßois Lescurat|Junix Inocian|Frank Walmsley|Ilario Bisi-Pedro|Maung Maung Khin|Win Kyaw Tun|Kriang Kunsri|Tun Tun|Khin Maung Yin|Nicolas Vee|Akira Koieyama|Al Barclay|Guy Barwell|Antony Hickling|Teerawat Mulvilai|Aurore Pariente|Danny Toeng|Azuki|Bruce Blain|Michael Hennessy|Martin John King
title: The Lady
